review: The PreSonus AudioBox USB 2x2 is a fantastic audio interface for anyone looking to get into recording, whether you're a musician or a podcaster. The build quality is solid, and it's very portable, which is perfect for my setup. The included Studio One software is a great addition, making it even more valuable. The zero-latency monitoring and high-performance preamps ensure a clean, professional sound. I've had no issues with setup or compatibility, and the price point is excellent for what you get. Highly recommend!
